attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I expected it to be like every other other apps time to download, but no. It took 4 HOURS. Once I downloaded it I went into the app and the app kept on glitching. It was not the phone that was glitching it was the app. Everyone I know who has this app says the exact same thing! Do not download this app! This app is not good at all. There is no point in downloading it if it’s going to disappoint everyone. I am trying to help you out, for YOUR BENEFIT! Coming from personal experience, do NOT download this app!

attributes.title: This is the worst app ever I wasted my time with this. It’s really trash
attributes.review: This app has been glitching all the time and every single time I click on it it just brings me back to my home screen and keeps on telling me to try to delete the app and put it back again and that i will need to pay some kind of fee. Don’t get this it is a wasted of time and the infomation are so simple that you can even look at the news or social media for this and not even get this stupid time wasting app 🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡😡👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

attributes.title: glitches
attributes.review: the second i selected download my hand started to turn orange. it started creeping up my arm and in a panic i went to the bathroom to wash it off. by the time i got there my hands had shrunk and i couldn’t turn the water on. when i looked in the mirror it had gotten to my neck and all i could do was watch as it spread to my face. oddly enough it stopped around my eyes and hairline. so now i look like an oompa loompa with a reverse forehead contour. also i haven’t been able to stop sniffing and slurring my speech since. 0/10 would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: SO BAD
attributes.review: I got this to support my president!! Little did I know that this app tracks and listens to you! And me being the lover of my rights and caring about no one else’s, I can’t have them listening!! It asked me for a donation to show my love for mr. president and little did I know the money is going to fund planned parenthood and the black lives matter organizations!!! And we can’t have that!! Cause planned parenthood and blm is clearly only for one thing! The devil!!!!! Save yourself from hell and do not donate to this app! We can save the babies if we get this app taken down!!!

attributes.title: NUDE PICTURE
attributes.review: I was happily downloading the app on the amazing App Store and when I first opened the app you won’t believe what I saw. I saw a nude picture of a Racist motherfu- I mean our President Donald J. Trump. What even shocked me more is that his Willy wasn’t  even bigger then a child’s pinky finger. It looked like a sad small shrimp you find on some fried rice or something like that. This is abuse and neglect towards that illegal imm- I mean our First Lady, Melania Trump. Imagine the pain and frustration she has to endure when they do the deed. ALSO, Donald is abusing and brain washing his son Baron Trump, all these years. K I’m done.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!! DO NOT GET💔
attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to see what is was about because of course i am apart of the Trump cult and want everything to do with him, but when i logged in to my stuff in the app it IMMEDIATELY CRASHED!!!!!!!🤬🤬 i opened it again but this time there was a horrible demon on the cover page and then suddenly all my house lights turned off!!?!?!?? i was so scared so i called the police but they called me multiple slurs and hung up on me!! DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!! DO NOT VOTE FOR TRUMP OR MORE BAD THINGS LIKE THIS WILL HAPPEN. i have changed my mind and have decided to vote for biden instead😼❤️

attributes.title: A few problems🧚‍♀️🌸✨💖
attributes.review: Today was my birthday and I was so exited to finally be able to get our beautiful president’s app. But as soon as I opened the app there was a 🧡✨🌸Cheeto🌸✨🧡 on the front page. I was confused but I just ignored it. Then, a few hours after I downloaded the app, I started getting pop-ups on my phone with pictures of 🥰💫💦rump💦💫🥰 and little children. Which I thought was odd cause last I remembered he only had 5 kids, but it was probably a family reunion. All in all, a truly 💖🌸🧚‍♀️✨great experience✨🧚‍♀️🌸💖

attributes.title: free barron
attributes.review: i am absolutely flabbergasted by how bad this app is, i was lead to believe that this was to support our wonderful president but it’s not. after i downloaded the app my instagram got hacked and they began posting trump posts, they hacked my bank account and ordered merchandise (which i eventually cancelled) and they also hacked my email!!! i don’t know how to get rid of all this support trump bs. after all this happened i’m disappointed and i no longer support trump, instead SUPPORT MANNY!!!!! anyways don’t buy this, it took away so mich valuable time!!!!

attributes.title: Nasty person
attributes.review: I was at my grandmas funeral when Donald trump and his wife ivanka asked me to download this app and I was like no so they but me into a prison cell in the White House with Barron trump and I was like Barron are you good and he she his head no he had to crouch because he’s eight feet tall but that’s not that point anyways I knew I had to help Milana and Barron escape so I made a plan for Melania to scream hello as loud as she could so that me and Barron could escape long story short be and Barron now have two kids and I’m pretty sure ivanka is barrons mom. That’s why I’m giving this app a one star review

attributes.title: annoying
attributes.review: i honestly thought this app would make me laugh a bit, and i was right because as i downloaded it; it was all making me die of laughter that my parents got mad at me and grounded me because I woke them up! they told me that there is nothing funny about pigs at 3 am. I got my phone back but it’s not the same anymore, I got used to the same jokes over and over again. Honestly they should fix it because my little sister also got scared when i got a notification by this app, she is traumatized!
